DiceComponent - Class in dicegame
Combines the instructions of drawing the shape with the game logic to update the dice graphics based on the status of the game

Constructor to set the frame size for the DiceComponent
DiceFace - Class in dicegame
Instruction set to draw the dice depending on the value rolled

dicegame - package dicegame
 
DiceViewer - Class in dicegame
Deals with displaying the interface and graphics on the screen

doFirstroll() - Method in class dicegame.CrapsGame
Starts the first roll of the game and saves the point returning all of the information as a string
draw(Graphics2D) - Method in class dicegame.DiceFace
Uses graphics to draw the dice based on colour, dice value and position from the constructor
